title: Comet

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Distract two target players at night by calling a comet to drift across the night sky.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your targets will be roleblocked, and you will fail all visits against them.
- You may only act on odd-numbered nights.
- You may instead perform the factional Rock kill.

desc:
Post 126
*The night sky holds many things--some eternal, others fleeting. Look up once in a while, why don't you?*
Roleblock Immune
Redirect Immune
Control Immune
